list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: working or produced by machines or machinery.
(of a person or action) not having or showing thought or spontaneity; automatic.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she stopped the mechanical brushing of her hair
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô dừng việc chải tóc cơ học

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to physical forces or motion; physical.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the smoothness was the result of mechanical abrasion
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sự trơn tru là kết quả của sự mài mòn cơ học

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the working parts of a machine, especially a car.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a major overhaul of the mechanicals
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một đại tu lớn của các cơ khí

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially with allusion to Shakespeare's A Midsummer Night's Dream ) a manual worker.
